website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive way to make learning about the world fun, thanks to this cool, easy-to-position map featuring an adhesive back that doesn't leave a sticky mess.
pros: Works like a window cling, only it's designed for the wall or whiteboard
the material is perfect for making notations with markers, which wipe clean
Users like it for school, business, and home, to learn geography and keep track of travel destinations
cons: May need 2 people to position on wall
Some users wish it were a bit bigger

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea it was that big! I'm super duper pleased. Took me a while (maybe like 10 times) to put it up on my slanted ceiling/wall and make it straight, but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: They did look great, but...
customer_reviews.text: At first, I hung them on my textured walls. They did look great, but the texture behind the walls did come through on to the map. The maps looked bumpy when the light would shine on the maps. I went out and bought two pieces of foam board and Loctite spray adhesive ($15 for 2 boards and adhesive, at my local craft store). I then used the adhesive to permanently mount the maps onto the foam board. They look absolutely amazing! Now they are very sturdy, they look great, and I can move them around my walls! Definitely worth the effort and price!
customer_reviews.author: K.Hegg

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: This is horrible. We got this for my daughter for school. I was excited when we got it and put it up on a clean, dry wall. Less than an hour later, I came back into the room and it fallen down off the fall, folded over itself and was completely unsalvagable. What a WASTE! I choose when our money is spent carefully and I am mad that this product didn't even last an hour in our home. Ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa S.

customer_reviews.title: The poster and description are just as described. I ...
customer_reviews.text: The poster and description are just as described. I didn’t read it well. I didn’t realize it was a peel and stick, so pay close attention to that. You really can’t just put it on the wall with tacs, because it had bubbles in it because it’s a giant sticker. I don’t want to put in on the wall, being afraid that it would pull off the paint. I’m going to buy a poster board and put it on there to put it on the wall. There are labels for the countries that are so crammed close together that you can’t tell where they belong. With all of that being said, I did get what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size.
customer_reviews.text: I have this up in my Ham Radio Room to quickly mark contacts I make and it's just about the right size for me to reach any spot on earth without having to awkwardly extend my reach from my chair. When my nephew comes over (9 years old), he can clearly and quickly mark a country he learned about in school he wants me to try to talk to. It's a no-nonsense map with a good coating that works well with dry-erase markers and semi-permanent "overhead projection" markers (they can be washed off with water and a cloth) and the price is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: LSDean

customer_reviews.title: Works great but arrived damaged...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time BUT with a crease along one side. so the map was not in perfect condition. I pinned it to the wall instead of using the sticky back. I suppose if I used the sticky back it might have installed as advertised. No reason for it to be delivered without any damage however. I like things to arrive undamaged. Works just fine once I got it pinned to the wall. Shipping needs to work on quality control. Although I understand that it you are shipping thousands of items, every so often something is going to slip though... overall I have to say great job.
customer_reviews.author: Krank1960

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: Just stuck this world map up over my son's homeschool desk this evening, and I am loving it so far. It has beautiful muted color tones, sticks well without any wrinkles, was easy to put up and even to move over to get it straight and centered, absolutely no complaints at all - at least on day 1. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vintage Verified

customer_reviews.title: Very nice decal
customer_reviews.text: I put this decal onto a cork board of comparable size to hang on my wall. It stuck very nicely without any wrinkles while smoothing it out with a card. I've had it on the wall for almost a month now and there hasn't been any peeling or defects! I used this as a pin map to mark where I've travelled to!
customer_reviews.author: breanne behnke

customer_reviews.title: Great map for the classroom
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two maps for a friend to use in her classroom(s). Although the application was easy, please note that it does tend to stick to itself, comes apart without issue though. So far (3 weeks into the school year) the map has remained in place on the painted cinder block walls despite the humidity. Much easier than a previous laminated world map that, although larger, was constantly wrinkling and falling down. Wipe off marker included. Packaging was great as well, no damage in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to the wall easily, looks great, and erases perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We posted this plus the USA on our wall when my daughter was being called on a mission for our church. It worked great as a place for all visitors to our home to write in where they were guessing she would go. Now, a few months later, we have not taken them down because my kids like to use them to see where in the world/country various news stories happen. Constantly getting erased and written on.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan AZ

customer_reviews.title: It is laminated and easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: I am reviewing the Brewster Wall Pops WPE99074 Peel & Stick World Dry-Erase Map with Marker by Brewster. This map is 2 feet by 3 feet. It is laminated. I have not tried the 'peal and stick' portion of it. I used a dry erase marker on it and it worked fine. The map is labeled and easy to read. It shows latitude and longitude. It was perfect for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Hermione

customer_reviews.title: Excellent learning decor.
customer_reviews.text: Great Wall map for a kids home desk area. My kid loves looking at it and finding new places. Colors are pleasing. I applied, straightened, and re-applied with no problems. I used a squeegee-like object to Minimize bubbles at it is adhering flush to wall beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Like it. I wanted to keep map close by ...
customer_reviews.text: Like it. I wanted to keep map close by my favorite TV watching chair so I can "easily " find places on the world map.. . . . The places that are discussed on a daily basis. It gives me a better feeling for the NATO nations as well as the Muslim countries so often in the news. The packaging Tube is a great place to keep map as it makes it convenient to pull out peruse and replace. I feel I'll be using this map on a daily basis due to the many world happenings..
customer_reviews.author: dyna

customer_reviews.title: Draw and erase
customer_reviews.text: I give it 4 stars because it doesn't stay on the wall. Had to put thumbtacks which I was trying to avoid. Either way my 8 year old is learning a lot from this map. It's great being able to draw on it and erase it later.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Estrella

customer_reviews.title: good map, but arrived all banged up
customer_reviews.text: it arrived all smashed in, bent, and creased, and those didn't come out even when i put it up. that said, it's a nice, colorful, detailed map, and it sticks up easily--i put it on a glass sliding door. the erasable marker that comes with it also sticks up easily in its holder, and it writes well, and has a nice eraser on the marker cap. probably 5 stars for the map itself, which seems to me a good value, but if it's going to be mailed it needs to be better packaged.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my family to mark with pins on where we have gone in the world. I bought cork board to put behind it for when they put a pin in it goes in there. Very easy to install, super fast shipping, and sturdy. Even though it says peel and stick the paper material is very sturdy and strong. It's a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I was prepared for the "creasing" that appeared immediately upon ...
customer_reviews.text: I was prepared for the "creasing" that appeared immediately upon unpacking actually because of other reviews. I am hoping that they will come out as we place onto a paper backing to then put up on a wall. The colors are bright and looks very professional. Just a little worried about transferring to a backing.
customer_reviews.author: Vern and Ardee

customer_reviews.title: great for kid's room
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was always asking me where places were that we read about in books at nighttime reading, and now we can finally see them right away..on her wall! Easy to put on and doesn't peel paint coming off. And since it doesn't stick out, it won't get knocked off the wall accidentally. It's perfect. Personally I don't use the marker because I don't want it to be used on the wall by accident.
customer_reviews.author: BecsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Go with a different product.
customer_reviews.text: I am so bummed! I purchased this for hanging on a wall in our home. I was glad to see it looked easy enough to hang, once it was up and smoothed out I was pleased. The next morning I found the map on the floor, folded onto itself. It was so sticky it was impossible to unstick the map from itself without having it rip! The map was on the wall for less than 12 hours before it fell, and became useless.
customer_reviews.author: MinaDrew

customer_reviews.title: Its really great to be able to show the children in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I am in the Peace Corps and bought this before leaving for service. Its really great to be able to show the children in my very small town where they live, where I lived, and really just to learn about our global community. Unfortunately this is a piece of junk and proceeded to fall off my wall at least once a day, the only thing it stuck to was its self, causing it to rip when I would try to pull it apart to hang on my wall again. I really wish I could get my money back for this. My advice. go get a cheap paper map and tape it to your wall... your better off.
customer_reviews.author: Dréa de la Sol

customer_reviews.title: Came bent and crinkled
customer_reviews.text: This came bent and crinkled. Oddly, there is not way to add a photo to this review, but the map looks awfully bent and crinkled.
customer_reviews.author: McLovins

customer_reviews.title: Still a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: The map arrived in a very secured package. It is true to size and the details of this map are displayed well. The one negative is the adhesive on the back of the map, it adheres to the wall for about 20 mins before it fell off. The wall had been cleaned with alcohol and allowed time to dry. I ended up having to use thumb tacks to secure it. Not a deal breaker by far. Still a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rave Reviewz

customer_reviews.title: Looks great I don’t take backing off and pin it
customer_reviews.text: Love this product second one. So I don’t ever take out the sticker off I think it works better if u push pin it to the wall if u can so u can move it later and it just works better with the backing on the markers
customer_reviews.author: sulma a.

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! It adheres to the wall easily and stays flat without much effort. My kids are enjoying learning about different countries around the world. I think it'll stay in our office for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to our classical homeschool
customer_reviews.text: We loved this map! I thought it was easy to apply to the wall. I have regular Sheetrock walls painted with regular paint. It went on easy, I peeled the liner back as I stuck it to the wall. We have been using it in homeschool for geography lessons. My boys use a dry erase marker on it and it cleans up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Cellio

customer_reviews.title: Nice map
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter to track where her dad is on his deployment. It erases nicely and doesn't leave marks. Everything is readable.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Map is bent and the pen is dried completely.
customer_reviews.text: So the outter box (Amazon box) is all good. But the box for the map itself is banded. As a consequence, the map is bent, which I don't mind too much, I can deal with it! BUT, the pen comes with it is DRY! DRIED up totally, can't even leave a mark. And it is too late to return since I have already put it on my wall. This is the most disappointed Amazon purchase so far. All other purchases, I am super satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, but beware!
customer_reviews.text: This went up so nice and was so beautiful for about 2 weeks and then it randomly fell off of the wall and stuck together, making it unusable. If I had known I would've secured it with pins, but didn't think it was necessary since it had adhesive on the back. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: BookLover

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the USA one to have for our homeschool areas. I love these. They are a great size, fairly large so make sure you measure the wall space you have. Accurate, good quality, and I love the fact that they are dry erase. My kids love these and so do I.
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: It hangs on our dining room wall and we refer to it all the time. I'm glad to have the option of removing it and putting it somewhere else, though I haven't actually ever needed to do that yet. It seems like a good-enough map, it wipes clean (good for the dining room, especially since it's in a high-traffic area and we have small children!), and I was grateful to not need to frame it or anything. Just slap it up and it's ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: HotCoffee

customer_reviews.title: Very good; would be excellent if the adhesive were just a little bit stronger
customer_reviews.text: We really like this--it's right by our dinner table and makes it easy to talk about what's happening in the world, where we've been, what we've been reading about, etc., with the kids. The only drawback is the stickiness seems just a little bit lacking. We've had ours on the wall (textured, painted walls) for about 8 months, and one of the corners regularly/stubbornly peels back on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: glued this to a cork board so my wife can ...
customer_reviews.text: glued this to a cork board so my wife can put pins in the places we've been. the adhesive that is already on the map should be sufficient to stick it up on a wall for a while, but I wouldn't trust it to stick to the cork board indefinitely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect world map for children to decorate their room with! At least that's what I did with mine!! Pl kush gives them something to look at and study when they are in timeout!!😆 winning!!
customer_reviews.author: Micaela Gunderson

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t stick to wall well
customer_reviews.text: Hung map up and the next day woke up to it like this. Product didn’t last 24 hours on the wall and then when it fell down it stuck together. My daughter loved the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachyinel Peeters7 5

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: These graphics are amazing. My son writes on them and erases constantly and they show no signs of wear a year later. They also have stuck to the wall and are not peeling off. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to apply!
customer_reviews.text: My son is a geography freak at only four years old. Having these maps to write on with dry erase markers has been an excellent learning tool for him. He loves tracking our family and friends' car travels and making up stories of trips around the country and the world. They were extremely easy to apply to the wall and have stayed stuck without any peeling or tearing. They wipe off beautifully. No complaints! Fantastic product at a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.author: Saunch09

customer_reviews.title: Great map, but be careful where you apply it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great map, but we had a terrible time with the peel and stick feature. We put it on a cabinet and wanted to move it a short time later, so took it off and it took a LOT of the finish off the cabinet. Then tried to stick it on a wall. I was able to put it up, but it then fell down and ended up wrinkled and sticking to itself. I managed to pull it apart, and put it back up with tacks, but it's very wrinkled. Again, great map, but be careful where you put it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these wall maps
customer_reviews.text: I love these wall maps. I attach them to a white board and use magnetic "stick pins" to identify places I have visited. I found that wetting the white board with a very wet sponge and attaching the map using a squeegee or credit card minimized the air bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: great map, sticks well, dry erase needs water to remove
customer_reviews.text: this is a very nice world map. I wish it showed the US state boarders a bit better, but all major cities are shown. The peel and stick works great on painted drywall. I was able to put it up on the first try without any bubbles. The dry erase marker does not come off without the use of a damp towel. 95% will come off with a dry wipe, but it will leave behind a dark cloud that requires some dampness to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Just a guy

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to attach and remove.
customer_reviews.text: Easily attached to surface. Can be removed if pulled slowly so it doesn’t stretch or tear. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: The Cryptic Room

customer_reviews.title: Educational and practical...
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my exercise room to leave reminders and such. It sticks securely and peels off without wall paint damage. It is very attractive and surprisingly detailed. I like this a lot but I wish I would have have one in my bedroom when I was nine years old. A perfect future gift for my nephews and nieces.
customer_reviews.author: NorthghostTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I stuck it to the top of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I stuck it to the top of my dining room table, easy to clean, and remove, hot plates have not seemed to hurt it. Recommended great for trip planning
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Pawley

customer_reviews.title: Nice map
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I think, but it’s big enough to see clearly. And it comes with a marker, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Totally, it worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaowei W.

customer_reviews.title: It fills the need.
customer_reviews.text: It came a bit smashed which means the corner that was wrinkled won't stick to my wall. Since it is suppose to be repositionable and that small bend in the map keeps coming off the wall, I'm not sure how it would do with peeling and resticking it multiple times. I also don't plan to find out any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and so cool that it can be written on.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this map for our home office, but my child begged for it. He won! We love that you can write on it and re-position it. It's super easy to get on the wall and was still sticky enough when I had to remove it and make adjustments. I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JEAINE6

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bought for our temporary homeschool (thanks, COVID-19 🙄) room and it is perfect. Decent size, thick material, sticks well to the wall (yet was easy to reposition) and looks clean. I love that it has a dry erase marker for easy teaching. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMom2

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: We are taking a virtual walking trip to Thailand to prepare for our upcoming adoption of baby Vincent. The whole family records how many minutes each of us exercises each day, then we total the minutes weekly. We pretend that each minute equals a mile. The wall map sticks really well on a wood closet door, and we can plot our progress easily with a dry erase pen. When we are finished with this imaginary trip, we can start another. The map is colorful, accurate, and "just what we wanted!"
customer_reviews.author: J. Stratton

customer_reviews.title: This was easy to apply is the perfect size to adhere to ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a map to refer to when my grandchildren and/or I read about happenings in far away countries. This was easy to apply is the perfect size to adhere to one of my sliding closet doors. I put this up in the room I use as an office. Now we have a better perspective of the bigger word we live in.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Use a hair drier to make it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Use a hair drier to make it easier to peel off. We stuck ours on on a chalk board in our meeting room. It was too risky to leave on the drywall. This is such a good quality print. Very detailed and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great map for the price. I'm buying 2 more for the family! It could go on a wall, but we like it flat on the table. We peeled back the clear plastic (half at a time) and smoothed out the wrinkles and air bubbles then replaced the clear plastic. Great for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: PJS

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This map is fantastic! It went up on my slightly textured wall with no problems and has been awesome for our homeschooling conversations. We've used markers on it and left them for weeks and they still clean off easily! A fantastic product! As soon as I find wall space I'm going to buy the one of the United States!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Haiman

customer_reviews.title: nice large map
customer_reviews.text: nice large map, perfect for marking out our adventures. only complaint is that it didn't stick to our wall like we had hoped so it fell one day while we were gone and got stuck to itself, impossible to straight back out after that.
customer_reviews.author: Marc B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality world map
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality world map. I attached it to cardboard, framed it and we put pushpins in it for places we've traveled.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great image and fun, VERY thin material
customer_reviews.text: I'm so excited to use this in my classroom. The picture is very clear and nice. I also like the idea of being able to stick it anywhere! My only hang up is that the material is very thin and flimsy and just taking the map out of it's box to look at it caused wrinkles and creases in the map. Other than that it's super :)
customer_reviews.author: Jesica

customer_reviews.title: Crinkled and gouged!
customer_reviews.text: SAVE YOUR MONEY AND PURCHASE A DIFFERENT MAP. My map arrived damaged all along the bottom. There are creases and lines throughout the entirety of the map. I wanted to return it for a refund but apparently it is not eligible for a return. So I am stuck with a ruined map. I am very unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cayla Holthaus

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: This had mixed reviews but I tried it anyway and it's great! I think there just may have been some bad batches or something, but ours went up with no problems and has been on the wall without moving or peeling for months now. And we have textured walls! Great product would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Fallon Tuthill

customer_reviews.title: BEST MAP EVER
customer_reviews.text: BEST MAP EVER! This map was exactly what i was looking for great size looking studying. The peel and stick is a great feature so can move the map to the best area to view. i would recommend this map to anyone looking for a long lasting map.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Capulong

customer_reviews.title: World Map with DRY erase marker
customer_reviews.text: The map was great, exactly what I was looking for, the dry erase marker was just that, all dried out, unable to use, will have to go buy one now for this map.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love love love this
customer_reviews.text: love love love this. I stuck on my daughters wall and we circle the places we want to visit and a heart on the ones we went to.
customer_reviews.author: kathy herbert

customer_reviews.title: Great map. When I received the map
customer_reviews.text: Great map. When I received the map, it looked wrinkled, but after I put it on the wall, it came out great. put it up and you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Willing to try

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and functional
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and I enjoy using the dry erase feature for notes and lists. It's also fun to mark locations I have visited or am planning to go. I didn't realize the dry poster had an adhesive back option if you peel away the paper until I was putting it up but I decided to hang it on the wall with tacks instead. Delivery was quick and packaging was nice. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Reid

customer_reviews.title: Great map for school!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for school project!! Dry erase works well and it’s a very nice sized map!! Would definitely buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Kikki

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This is helping me plan my trip around the world. And it's inspiring! I've partially peeled it off of my painted plaster walls and had no problem re-attaching it. Pretty big size. Eye catching. Definitely recommend for kids, students, families, or soon-to-be travelers!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Great wall decal!
customer_reviews.text: This map is wonderful! I'm seriously thinking of ordering another one. I love that you can scribble on it and erase after.
customer_reviews.author: Someone Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Great Map
customer_reviews.text: I bought this map as an anniversary gift for my husband. We wanted to be able to keep track of all the places we have been together and all the places we still want to go. We just got back from a 3-week honeymoon cruise that left Hawaii and ended in Sydney, Australia. I am so excited to hang this map and start putting the push pins in.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mcquillin

customer_reviews.title: Great map. Very detailed with the latest changes.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great map is so many ways. I love that it can be put on the wall without damaging it. I love that it is up to date. I love being able to write on it. One tip, save the backing in case you move then you can put it back on to transport it. If the back gets gets stuck to itself, it is very hard to unstick it.
customer_reviews.author: melissa bearden

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! Lamination is terrible! Once unrolled and flattened out there are ridges and creases throughout the map which makes it impossible to read! I just found out this is NOT RETURNABLE! Rip off!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Good for your inner globetrotter
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool. Always wanted one these! Make sure you look at the measurements. It was bigger than I initially expected but it looks great on my wall. It's a terrific way to mark all the places you have traveled to or plan to travel to in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: C-Mad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size and sticks well to the wall! Very nice colors. Also love the fact that it comes with a marker and self stick marker holder. We use this for homeschooling and are able to mark off the areas of the world that we have studied.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick to textured walls.
customer_reviews.text: This is cool but it doesn't stick to my wall because it's slightly textured. There's probably a warning somewhere about this, but I didn't see it. I suppose if you have a completely smooth wall or surface, it would be just fine. As it stands, I put thumb tacks on the corners and it's just fine as a poster you can write on.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylene

customer_reviews.title: Nice map of the world
customer_reviews.text: Very clear and usable map for my kid along with a globe which we already had, gives a different perspective to understand the world's layout. Sticker variety really makes it reusable, do retain the non-glue part of the sticker if you need to remove the map from the wall and store it for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: P. Das

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick.
customer_reviews.text: Awful! This product would not stick to my wall. It would stay for maybe a day before falling down. I bought to use at our "deployment station" and was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P.

customer_reviews.title: ... of complex travel for work and these maps are great to plan out the best route
customer_reviews.text: I plan a lot of complex travel for work and these maps are great to plan out the best route. Easy to apply!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I use this map to talk with my son about different places and it works great, I have NOT stuck it to the wall or wrote on it with the marker, we use it strictly as a fold out look / talk about and put up map.
customer_reviews.author: DDerr

customer_reviews.title: Bad product!
customer_reviews.text: Did not stick to wall! Had to buy another map. Don’t waste your money! Dry erase marker didn’t work either.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Just removed the map and it took a good piece of my wall off
customer_reviews.text: Just removed the map and it took a good piece of my wall off. We’ve had other decals on our wall that removed without issue. Map was great until we removed it.
customer_reviews.author: LCB

customer_reviews.title: Looks very expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice map that I framed with molding (Home Depot) and mounted on a piece of foam core (I got for $1.00 at Dollar Tree) to use with push pins for our travels. Looks really nice and expensive in our den.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Lover

customer_reviews.title: Very detailed map
customer_reviews.text: You can't tell the detail of this map but it is VERY detailed. It's a gift so I can't speak to the peel and stick quality yet but the map is really nice. Much nicer than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: anm

customer_reviews.title: Peel and applied to a large piece pexi glass like tinting Windows and built a wooden picture frame to ...
customer_reviews.text: Peel and applied to a large piece pexi glass like tinting Windows and built a wooden picture frame to enclose it. Looks and its stuck on really well. Would not recommend for direct wall application.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M. B. Joachim

customer_reviews.title: Nice wold map
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a map that I could frame for a wall decoration but also mark down places my husband and I have travelled. We didn't end up using the peel and stick feature since we framed it to hang on the walls. But it is a nice map. We bought the coordinating US map to hang as well.
customer_reviews.author: BethT

customer_reviews.title: Very nice map. I got this to put it next ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice map. I got this to put it next to my son's bed as he love watching at it before sleep and discover a new country every day. Size is good enough for him. Dry erase surface is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Verified buyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking map. I've moved it a few times on a painted cinderblock wall with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Briggity Brent

customer_reviews.title: but I guess its like that on most of
customer_reviews.text: Size of the polar continents seem to be blown up, but I guess its like that on most of them
customer_reviews.author: Serg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my bedroom!
customer_reviews.text: Love having this to learn. Shipped fast. Easy to apply. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kelligurl

customer_reviews.title: Great size and love the sticky back
customer_reviews.text: Great size and love the sticky back. But the vinyl in comes on smells horrible. Glad that part was just the backing!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: This is great! I didn't realize it is dry erase so ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I didn't realize it is dry erase so you can write or circle or put whatever you want on there. Even comes with a dry erase marker.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great look!
customer_reviews.text: Plan to hang this soon and mark all the places I've visited / Plan to visit. It looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my granddaughter. She absolutely loves it. She is 7. It is a wonderful tool to get kids excited about geography.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Permanently Creased
customer_reviews.text: The map is good quality and as described. Unfortunately, it came permanently creased, having been crushed prior to being placed in very good packaging. It is unfortunate that a company can create a nice product but can't pack it without ruining it.
customer_reviews.author: merilee dodson

customer_reviews.title: Great map! We haven't stuck it on the wall ...
customer_reviews.text: Great map! We haven't stuck it on the wall yet so I cannot yet give an opinion on this. However, the dry erase marker does not work well on this map. We did not purchase the map because of this feature so the disappointment was minimal. This would not be the map for you if you strongly desire that feature!
customer_reviews.author: Beka

customer_reviews.title: A good size to look at
customer_reviews.text: A good size to look at. Since I have attached it to the wall, everyone that has seen it thus far has stared at it and imparted very interesting geographical or historical information. I did notice that the left corner of the map bubbled when I straightened it out within the first couple of days, but it was easily "unbubbled" by peeling that section from its backing and resticking back onto the aforementioned backing.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Great learning/decorative part of our day.
customer_reviews.text: I love this draw on/dry erase world map. Protects the wall and teaches. We love drawing arrows to places that are relevant to discussion each day.
customer_reviews.author: dude

customer_reviews.title: Decent map
customer_reviews.text: It has adequate detail for my little one's room but probably not enough for a high school or college student. It did adhere to our semi-gloss & slightly textured wall okay so far. It is a fun map but not very big and not extraordinary in details.
customer_reviews.author: JBtw

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Map arrived creased from folding, so I laid it flat with heavy objects before putting it up. I applied this on my own without a problem. It's a great size for my bedroom - big enough to make a statement and the countries/names are clear. Love the colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: syshoptoomuch

customer_reviews.title: Good size, sticks well, looks great
customer_reviews.text: This is hanging on the wall in my son's room, he loves it! It has been up for a year and has not come down nor have the corners curled. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Y

customer_reviews.title: beautiful map
customer_reviews.text: We loved it!!! you must put it up with another person if not you may run the risk for it to get stock together and rip while you try to take it apart. it is awesome the fact that yo can write on it. Great for teaching children about geography. We put it in our kids bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Solid Map - Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Solid map...not too big. The dry erase marker works well and makes the map more interactive to draw on it. It's been a great buy to plan our RTW trip!
customer_reviews.author: Stevil

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT! I peeled it and framed it
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT! I peeled it and framed it. Every country/state I go to, I put a color it in with a red expo marker.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to help my kids see the different locations their dad was during his deployment. I was able to circle the country or state, then erase it when it changed to a new location. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mary R

customer_reviews.title: very nice good value
customer_reviews.text: very nice map, attached to builder grade flat wall paint without any issues - good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: LESTYSJA

product_meta.title: World Dry Erase Map Decal
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Just peel & stick to create your own signature style. Choose from a variety of colorful and trendy design options that will literally transform any room from ordinary to fabulous in minutes! WallPops is where fashion and function come together. Even better WallPops are repositionable! That’s right… they come off the wall as easy as they go on without harming walls or leaving sticky adhesives. And because they are not permanent, if you change your mind, you can change your design!
feature_bullets: Safe For Walls, Leaves No Sticky Residue
